string_data: check failed - There are several factual inconsistencies and errors that damage plausibility. The article states Roger Hallam received a "four-year sentence" in the main text but then mentions "IMPRISONED FOR 5 YEARS" in the image caption, creating a contradiction. Additionally, the article appears to be written in 2025 (based on image URLs showing "2025/04/") but refers to events as if they just happened, when Just Stop Oil's major activities and the sentences mentioned occurred in 2022-2024. The timeline doesn't align properly for a mainstream news article.
